ComicInfo.Title: Uni-Universe; In Trouble Again; Greater Influence; Turning Over A New Leaf; Bottle Trick; Girls Of Stosstrupp
ComicInfo.Summary:
Uni-Universe: A warrior finds himself in a mystical land of the fallen, attended to by three nubile nymphs.
In Trouble Again: Gary can't resist drawing naked pictures of the girlfriend of his very muscular and very jealous roommate.
Greater Influence: Michelle's physical desire for Eric once again overrides her frustration over his immature behavior.
Turning Over A New Leaf: An artist starts to draw a non-pornographic picture, but his mind soon leads him astray.
Bottle Trick: A pedestrian is lured into a theater on the promise of an explicit show.
Girls Of Stosstrupp: An all-female army platoon realizes one of their members is having a sexual liaison aboard an aground patrol boat with a man from another platoon and the girls conspire to spy on them.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev110 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-28 18:26:49. [Issue ID 248486]
ComicInfo.Writer: Stephan Peregrine,Chris Whalen,Bill Schmickle,Paul Kidd,Ted Sheppard
ComicInfo.Penciller: Stephan Peregrine,Chris Whalen,Bill Schmickle,Brian Sutton,Ted Sheppard
